DefaultEvent.Description: 船倉の後部に何かがある……@{K}Here's something at the back of the hold...
DefaultEvent.Name: これは何だ？@{K}What's this?

ChildBranches.Name: 穴を開けて沈める@{K}Scuttle her
ChildBranches.Description: 上等な船だ。奪えるものだけ奪って先に進もう。@{K}She was a fine ship. Take what you can and move on.

Description: この船はあなたの物だ！さて、どうしようか？@{K}The ship is yours! What will you do with her?
Name: アルカイオス級船を打ち倒した@{K}You've defeated an Alcaeus-class vessel
